overview: In this documentary of the historic and influential fight, we see the stories of two young lads intertwined like barbed wire and thorns. The Brains and Brawn of Alec had been met with its adversary in Saddiq’s shadowy and cunning prowler primitive  instincts. From dusk til’ dawn there’s nothing more than solemn prayer, bloodthirsty spectators, teeth flying like bullets, blood gushing and sweating flooding Highfields. Transpiring in a biblical series of events, we set the scene In Highfields... Purgatory.
tagline: What lies beyond prayers? What is the price of blood?
title: Havoc In Highfields
